intro: Lxframes is a portfolio website for Lanxiang Vermeulen, showcasing her school and professional work, built with Next.js, SCSS, TypeScript, and Decap CMS.
tagline: Programming my way into her heart
title: Lxframes

image.alt: Lxframes' 'Breng een boek tot leven' project.

content:
Lxframes is a website I developed for my partner, [Lanxiang Vermeulen](https://www.linkedin.com/in/lanxiang-vermeulen-498471185/). She needed a portfolio to showcase her school and professional work while searching for internships, as well as her professional work as a photographer.

Lanxiang provided her own designs, which I then turned into a website. I also created the mobile design and made final adjustments. This website was created using [Next](https://nextjs.org/), [SCSS](https://sass-lang.com/), [TypeScript](https://www.typescriptlang.org/), and [Decap CMS](https://decapcms.org/) for content management. Her portfolio successfully helped her find an internship, which was very rewarding.
